content: I think you take all of that kind of in conjunction with, as Marcel said, an environment where people are paying more for everything and when you go and look at the other components of travel, airfare, car rental, things like that in particular, I mean, I think, it's great to see the hotel business is able to hang in there with those other travel players who historically may have done a better job of driving rates than the hotel industry has for no reason other than that hotels didn't have the sophistication of systems and management to be able to really drive that.
